greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of cubes of odd primes dividing n.
link: Harvey P. Dale (terms 1 .. 1000) & Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Additive with a(p^e) = 0 if p = 2, p^3 otherwise.
G.f.: Sum_{k>=2} prime(k)^3*x^prime(k)/(1 - x^prime(k)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Jan 06 2017
a(1) = 0; after which, for even n: a(n) = a(n/2), for odd n: a(n) = A020639(n)^3 + a(A028234(n)).
mathematica: Array[DivisorSum[#, #^3 &, And[PrimeQ@ #, OddQ@ #] &] &, 60] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jul 11 2017 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(f=factor(n)); sum(k=1, #f~, if (((p=f[k,1])%2) == 1, p^3)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jul 11 2017
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
